result.description:

- Market research on business potential for new rail connected cross docking warehouse [M30]

category.displayCode: /HAZ2 Hazard Analysis: Safety requirements (rules and regulations):

result.title: Case studies with multi-source data assimilation
result.description: Existing and newly developed observation operators and error estimates will be combined and their mutual compatibility and complementarity will be assessed in all models involved, as well as the added value of each type of measurements. Experience of multi-pollutant air quality assimilation will be taken into account to identify and suppress potential “competition” between the datasets of different type. The impact and synergies of assimilating the data of different types into an ensemble of independent models will be assessed – and the harmonization procedure towards the coherent unified products will be suggested.

result.title: User experience results: Interactions for theatre in School
result.description: This document will describe the user interaction design and experimentation work that has informed the design of the Theatre in Schools service prototype. It will tell the story of the evolution of the design of the service prototype reporting on the way the design responded to requirement captured from stakeholders. It will also highlight the design principles adopted to guide the overall service prototype design.

result.title: MotoGP trial evaluation results
result.description: This will probably be a written report, accompanied by rich media (e.g. video/documentary material) to make the trial easy to visualise. In any case the deliverable must serve to describe the MotoGP trial and provide an evaluation of its results. The form of the evaluation cannot be defined yet; it could be user centric, and may be qualitative or quantitative, or it may be market centric and address issues that are more commercial. The form it takes will be determined in T4.1.

result.title: Prototype Service Descriptions: Second update
result.description: An update to D4.2 reflecting the development in thinking regarding each of the three prototype services. At this stage the MotoGP should have completed its scenario demo and there will have been opportunity to learn from that and adapt plans appropriately. The update with regard to the Football prototype will explain how this concept has matured. It may include firmer details about the matches and venues that are likely to be the subject of the trial

result.title: Theatre in school evaluation results
result.description: This will be a written report, accompanied by rich media (e.g. video/documentary material) to make the trial easy to visualise. In any case the deliverable must serve to describe the Theatre In School trial and provide an evaluation of the in school trial. The form of the evaluation cannot be defined yet, its form should be developed in consultation with Donmar Warehouse. It should be user centric and may be qualitative and quantitative or market centric and address issues that are more commercial. The form it takes will be defined through work carried out in T4.1.

result.title: Report on the modeling simulation framework able to simulate human immune system dynamics
result.description: The UNICT partner has developed through years a computational modeling infrastructure able to simulate the main features and dynamics of the immune system, named UISS (Universal Immune System Simulator). UISS is a multi-scale, multi-organ, three-dimensional agent based simulator of the immune system with an attached module able to simulate the dynamics of specific biological pathways at the molecular level. In this report we describe the extension and the enhancing of the UISS platform to take care of the human immune system at large scale, in order and include the organs that play important role in TB i.e., lungs and the lymph nodes around them.
